+// ignore-pretty
+
+#![feature(quote)]
+
+extern crate syntax;
+
+use syntax::ext::base::ExtCtxt;
+
+#[allow(dead_code)]
+fn foobar(cx: &mut ExtCtxt) {
+    quote_expr!(cx, 1i);
+    quote_expr!(cx, 2i);
+}
+
+fn main() { }
